walkthrough_description_slide_1: Talk anonymously with people in your area. Send an invite, form a group and start a conversation. How well do you really know your classmates or colleagues? Get to know each other better than ever and connect!
walkthrough_description_slide_2: Send an anonymous survey in one of your groups. Ask fellow students what they think of Corona measures or ask colleagues about their biggest stress point at work.
walkthrough_description_slide_3: Send an anonymous message to one of your friends. Ask them anonymously what they think about something.
account_logged_out_overview_description: How well do you really know those around you? Secry is about the real world! Create a group with people you know and ask them anything. Talk about issues, insecurities, sex, work, anthing you want to talk about. Become aware, help each other, connect and discover secrets!
account_forgot_password_description: Submit your email address and receive a link within minutes with which you can set a new password.
